content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces have copper plates in output but currently no ingredients or fuel

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position 7.5,9.5 to 12.5,11.5)
Production line for creating copper cables consisting of:
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 10.5) moving items from (6.5, 10.5) to (8.5, 10.5)
- Input wooden chest at (7.5, 11.5) containing copper plates and cables
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) set to produce copper cables
- Output burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving items from (10.5, 11.5) to (12.5, 11.5)
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing iron plates, copper cables and electronic circuits

### Storage Area (Position 14.5,11.5 to 16.5,11.5)
Two wooden chests for storage:
- Chest at (14.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5, 11.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,22.5 to -1.0,24.5)
Power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) currently without fuel
- Steam engine at (-3.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting various parts

### Science Pack Loading System (Position 0.5,28.5 to 0.5,31.5)
System for handling science packs:
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) moving items from (0.5, 31.5) to (0.5, 29.5)
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inserter placement
- Verify target position is clear before placing inserters
- Multiple attempts to place inserters at occupied positions (8.5, 11.5) and (8.5, 10.5)

### Errors related to fuel management
- Ensure coal is in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into entities
- Keep track of coal levels in burner inserters and boilers

### Power system issues
- Assembling machine showing NO_POWER status
- Steam engine not connected to power network
- Ensure complete power pole coverage between electricity consumers and generators

### Production line issues
- Assembling machine showing ingredient shortage
- Ensure proper item flow through inserters to maintain continuous production
